short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Newtabtv lets you quickly find movies and tv shows. Let the fun begin!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with our innovative new tab extension that turns every new tab into a personalized gateway. This feature-rich extension provides easy access to your favorite categories, including for example:

News: Stay informed with the latest headlines and updates from trusted sources.

Sports: Keep up with live scores, game schedules, and sports news.

Social: Connect seamlessly with your favorite social media platforms.

Shopping: Enjoy quick access to popular shopping sites for a smooth shopping experience.

In addition to curated site shortcuts, the new tab includes a powerful search bar for direct web searches, ensuring youâ€™re just a click away from what you need.

Transform your new tab page into a hub for convenience, tailored to your interests and daily online activities.
